docs.title: Compare missions in a sortable table
docs.text:
• This site aims to compare missions from the Antistasi Ultimate mod for Arma 3
  • Data is auto-generated from Antistasi Ultimate stable release v11.6.0 source code and verified against in-game information
  • 58 maps total including season variants, excluding Stratis
Map Climate Airports Bases Sea/riverports Outposts Factories Resources Totalmilitaryobjectives1 Towns2 TotalWar Levelpoints3ratio UMB Colombia tropical 5 3 13 41 11 23 96 40 1.00 Altis arid 6 5 6 50 13 12 92 47 1.00 Saint Kapaulio tropical 3 6 3 70 10 7 99 43 0.96 Mehland temperate 3 5 8 24 8 11 59 101 0.91 Cam Lao Nam tropical 4 6 5 39 4 17 75 60 0.89 Green Sea temperate 7 3 10 29 8 11 68 48 0.86 Gulfcoast Islands arid 5 5 10 23 9 15 67 54 0.86 Phuoc Tuy tropical 2 2 9 25 4 9 51 112 0.84 Yulakia temperate 4 6 7 32 9 11 69 44 0.81 Normandy temperate 5 3 0 21 8 15 52 92 0.79 Isla Duala arid 6 1 5 25 10 14 61 55 0.76 Chernarus 2020 temperate 3 4 5 22 10 10 54 71 0.74 Chernarus Redux temperate 4 2 5 31 10 12 64 49 0.73 G.O.S Al Rayak arid 4 1 4 22 7 9 47 89 0.73 Lingor Island tropical 9 3 4 22 4 6 48 45 0.72 Sahrani arid 5 2 9 19 5 17 57 41 0.70 Khe Sanh tropical 3 5 3 14 2 5 32 92 0.67 Tanoa tropical 5 2 6 17 4 8 42 56 0.63 Fapovo temperate 3 5 8 18 5 9 48 39 0.63 Napf Island A3 temperate 3 2 7 18 7 6 43 61 0.62 Napf Island A3 (Winter) arctic 3 2 7 18 7 6 43 61 0.62 Virolahti - docs.title: About this site
docs.text:
• Source code for this site; changelog; raise a bug, question or feature request

  • Version 0.9.2

  1. Total military objectives = sum(airports, sea/riverports, bases, outposts, factories, resources) ↩

  2. Known issue: towns aren't counted (and total War Level points can't be calculated) if they aren't explicitly declared in the mission files. Missing towns counts will be added in future ↩

  3. Ratio of mission's total War Level Points to the largest known value. Total War Level points = sum(8 × airports, 6 × bases, 4 × sea/riverports, 2 × outposts, 2 × factories, 2 × resources, towns) - thanks to Syrreal on AU Community Discord for pointing this out ↩
